text: Berta Riaza Gómez (27 July 1927 – 24 July 2022) was a Spanish actress. She was in over 100 movies and 60 stage shows during her near-60 year career. ==Life== Born in Madrid, she began her career in 1947 on a stage play titled Historia de una casa. In 1959, she made her movie debut with Diez fusiles esperan. Her best known movie roles include: Entre tinieblas (1983), Luces de bohemia (1985), El placer de matar (1988) and El Puzzle (2000). Her career mainly was focused on movies and stage roles. However, she appeared in a few television shows with Televisión Española. In 1980, she starred as Doña Guillermina in the miniseries Fortunata y Jacinta. In 2003, Riaza retired saying that the only roles she was getting were in unpopular stage plays. Riaza died on 24 July 2022 in Madrid, three days before her 95th birthday.Muere a los 94 años la actriz Berta Riaza ==Awards== * National Theater Award (1992) * Union of Actors Award for Best Secondary Theater Performance (1995) * Union of Actors Lifetime Award (1997) * Gold Medal of Merit in the Fine Arts (2007) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Spanish stage actors Category:Spanish voice actors Category:Actors from Madrid
